group_1.narration: Soon came the day of the ceremony,@the day that would change the course of fate…

group_1.textLeft: So…all I need to do is wait?

group_1.textRight: Yes.
If the god takes an interest in you,@he will guide you through the rest.
Be prepared. When he asks what it is@you desire…

group_1.textLeft: I tell him, "For the glory of@Queen Cleopatra…"

group_1.textRight: Precisely.
This is where I leave you. You can@accomplish the rest on your own.

group_1.textCenter: (What exactly does this god even look like…?)

group_1.textRight: So it's you this time.

group_1.textCenter: What?! Wh-where did that voice come from…?

group_1.textRight: I will grant you one wish, for whatever@it is you desire.
Right here.

group_1.textCenter: Here…? It does seem to be close…

group_1.textRight: As I said, I'm right here.
Hello there. My name is Kyubey.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:104801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]UWAAAAAAH!
Th-the beast is speaking to me…!

group_1.textRight: You must be Ebony of the Met Clan.
I take it you're here for your so-called@ritual, yes?

group_1.textLeft: …What?!
I-impossible…
You're…God?!

group_1.textRight: I am Kyubey.
Your clan refers to me as the White Beast God.

group_1.textLeft: The White Beast God…! Oh, how divine...!
…Oh, ah, yes! My name is Ebony!
I was sent to make a contract with you!
O White Beast God! Please accept me…!

group_1.textRight: You members of the Met Clan are always so quick@to understand. It saves me a lot of trouble.
I want you to make a contract with me@and become a Magical Girl right away.

group_1.textLeft: …Huh?

group_1.textRight: Didn't your clan inform you?
I will grant you one wish. It can be for@anything you want.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes, I was told! My deepest apologies…

group_1.textRight: In exchange, I want you to make a contract@with me, become a Magical Girl,
and fight Witches.

group_1.textLeft: …What?

group_1.textRight: Your clan refers to them as Evil Gods.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes, that's what you meant! I accept!

group_1.textRight: Let's not delay this any further. What is it@that you wish for, Ebony?

group_1.textLeft: My wish is…
"For the glory of Queen Cleopatra!"

group_1.textRight: I understand you refer to the current@Ptolemaic queen.
But what specifically do you mean@by "glory"?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Specifically? That is, erm, let me think…
Ah, erm… What should I say…?
(Wh-what should I do? Glory…glory…glory…)
…S-surely, the queen shall be known@in history forevermore…
So, in that case…ah ha!
I wish for history to know her glory@forevermore!

group_1.textRight: You wish for Queen Cleopatra's glory@to be carved in history, then.
Alright.
Your wish will be granted.

group_1.textLeft: Huh…?
(Oh thank goodness…)

group_1.textRight: The contract is complete.
May you take a look at your left hand?

group_1.textLeft: …My hand?
Hm…? A ring…! When did you…?

group_1.textRight: That's one of the elements that indicates@you are a Magical Girl.
Try transforming right now.

group_1.textLeft: …Transforming?
